cast.name: 詹妮弗·内特尔斯 Jennifer Nettles

introduction: Salute The Troops VH1 Divas 现场版。 Katy Perry, Keri Hilson, Jennifer Nettles三大美女联合助阵，katy姐姐带领的复古派美女团使整个表演让人好像回到了上个世纪的美国。 该演唱会在海军陆战队航空站举行，并将于美丽华国际广播。这些艺术家包括Katy Perry，Keri Hilson的，Nicki Minaj的和Sugarland。此外，作为一次特殊的待遇，Paramore演唱会在一个在中东的基地举办。专辑曲目:01. Katy Perry, Keri Hilson & Jennifer Nettles - Boogie Woogie Bugle Boy02. Paramore - The Only Exception03. Katy Perry - California Gurls04. Katy Perry - Teenage Dream05. Katy Perry - Hot and Cold06. Sugarland - Stuck Like Glue (with MC Lyte)07. Sugarland - Tonight08. Sugarland - All I Want to Do09. Grace Potter & The Nocturnals - Top Gun10. Grace Potter & The Nocturnals - Paris (Ooh La La)11. Grace Potter & The Nocturnals - Medicine12. Grace Potter & The Nocturnals - Rockin' in the Free World13. Nicki Minaj - Moment 4 Life14. Nicki Minaj - Right Thru Me15. Nicki Minaj - Roman's Revenge16. Nicki Minaj & Katy Perry - Girls Just Want to Have Fun17. Paramore - My Hero18. Keri Hilson - Turning Me On19. Keri Hilson - Knock You Down20. Keri Hilson - Pretty Girl Rock21. Keri Hilson & Sugarland - Think22. Katy Perry - Firework(来自verycd）
